Tensor Toolbox

The MATLAB Tensor Toolbox allows enables the creation and manipulation of dense and sparse multidimensional arrays.

Documentation

  • Tensors
  • Sparse Tensors
  • Converting a tensor to a matrix and vice versa
  • Converting sparse tensors to matrices and vice versa
  • Tucker Tensors
  • Kruskal tensors
  • Multiplying tensors
  • Generating the leading mode-n vectors
  • Collapsing and scaling tensors
  • Algorithms for computing tensor decompositions

Home Page

For more information and to subscribe to the mailing list, please visit the Tensor Toolbox homepage at http://csmr.ca.sandia.gov/~tgkolda/TensorToolbox/.
